column6: Sem in Wrks of Select Composer
column7: Intensive historical and analytical study of the works of important composers; each term devoted to one composer. May be repeated to a maximum of 16. (Summer session, 2 or 4 graduate hours). Prerequisite: Graduate standing in musicology or consent of instructor. Graduate students in music will be considered if they passed MUS 528A (consult Class Schedule for specific section information).
